item.title: Anyone Can Be an Auntie. It’s a State of Mind.
item.description: My Desi family introduced me to the role. Now that I’m an auntie, I understand its full potential.

item.title: Hollywood’s Woke Era Is Over. Now It’s Turning the Culture War Into Camp.
item.description: The industry seemed penned in by our political debates — until it started channeling them into wild caricatures and frothy drama.

item.title: Was It Wrong to Exclude One Person From Our Family Reunion?
item.description: She got wind of it and is furious.

item.title: How Has Being Perpetually Single Affected You as a Man?
item.description: We want to hear from men over the age of 30 who feel as if they have not yet had a meaningful romantic relationship for a New York Times Magazine feature.

item.title: Is It OK to Communicate at Work Using Voice Memos?
item.description: A ruling on office correspondence etiquette.

item.title: Chloé Zhao Is Yearning to Know How to Love
item.description: The “Hamnet” director on trying to overcome her deepest fears — and open her heart.

item.title: I Let My Wife Have an Affair. Do I Have to Console Her Now That It’s Over?
item.description: While she is grieving about it, I feel relieved.

item.title: What It’s Like to Live With One of Psychiatry’s Most Misunderstood Diagnoses
item.description: Spurred by her past struggles with dissociative identity disorder, she has devoted her professional life to studying it.

item.title: In Minnesota, America’s Federal System Is Coming Apart
item.description: The state is in a standoff with the federal government over who has the power to investigate the killing of protesters. It’s not a fair fight.

item.title: Are SpaghettiOs Soup?
item.description: A ruling on a “Souper” Bowl party dispute.

item.title: Nuclear Anxiety, That Staple of 1980s Cinema, Is Back
item.description: After the Cold War ended, our terror of nuclear war faded from the screen. Now it’s resurgent — and more fatalistic than ever.

item.title: Can I Tell a Member of My Church That I Recognize Him from a Dating App?
item.description: It would mean a lot to have someone I could relate to.

item.title: The Mushroom Gummies That Claim to Stimulate Your Brain
item.description: Fungal supplements are everywhere, promising happiness, energy, focus, you name it. But what they deliver is something else entirely.

item.title: ‘The Biggest Act of Union-Busting in U.S. History’: Trump’s War on Federal Workers
item.description: With 300,000 employees gone and collective-bargaining rights eliminated, the administration has hobbled organized labor. Did it also start a movement?
